# any

**Type Property**

The permission option the system uses to control whether a user can share publicly or privately.

## Declaration

```swift
static var any: CKSharingParticipantAccessOption { get }
```

## Configuring the options

- **anyoneWithLink**: The permission option the system uses to control whether a user can share publicly.
- **specifiedRecipientsOnly**: The permission option the system uses to control whether a user can share privately.
